question: Which country is to host 19th SCO Heads of Government Council in 2020?
explanation: India will host the 19th Council of Heads of Government of the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation in 2020. The first such high level meeting of the eight-member grouping is to be organized by New Delhi after its admission to the bloc in 2017. The SCO is a China-led eight-member economic and security bloc, in which India and Pakistan were admitted as full members in 2017. Its founding members included China, Russia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan and Uzbekistan.
